name: RollAbility
description:
Short Description

Use dice points to gain different abilities you can use to reach your lost slime friend!

How to play
  • Movement Modes
    • Jump 
      • Press space bar while touching ground to jump up. 
      • Use arrows keys or A and D to move left and right.
    • Flap (like Flappy Bird) 
      • Press space bar any time to jump up.  Jump is not as high as a regular jump.
      • Use arrows keys or A and D to move left and right.
    • Sling
      • Use mouse to drag across the screen from any 2 points, then release to jump in that direction like a slingshot.
      • The further you drag, the further you jump.
      • Can't move using keys, must sling yourself.
  • Dice
    • Randomly assign one of above abilities
    • Acts as a checkpoint
Notes

This is my first game jam I participate in and I'm really happy to say that I have learned a ton from this experience. 

Thanks for everyone who played my game! Any feedback is hugely appreciated as I am still very new to game development and would love to hear from you about anything I can improve on in the future!

Future Improvements
  • Add more levels
  • Add more movement modes like jetpacks 
  • Add moving platforms 
  • Disconnect dice from checkpoint. 
    • Two dice will be rolled. One to determine the ability, and another to determine the amount. E.g. 4 jumps, or 6 slings.
    • After amount runs out, a the dice will roll again
